珸字的基本解释

珸
wú
〔琨（
k憂 ）珸〕似玉的美石。

珸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wú］
［《廣韻》五乎切，平模，疑。］
见“琨珸”。

珸字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珸； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页732第11
【廣韻】五乎切【集韻】譌胡切，?音吾。【博雅】琨㻍，石次玉者。【五音集韻】琨珸，美石。【史記·司馬相如傳】琳瑉琨珸。【索隱註】琨珸，石之次玉也。河圖云：流州多積石，名琨珸石。鍊之成鐵，以作劎，光明如水精。　又山名。【前漢·司馬相如傳音義】琨珸，山名。出善金。　【類篇】本作㻍。

珸字的源字形

珸字的起名意思

似玉的美石，如琨珸。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　珸; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 732 No. 11
[Guangyun] Wuhuqie [Jiyun] Jiaohuqie, sound Wu. 【Bo Ya】Kun 㻍, Shi Ciyu. 【Pentagram rhyme】Kunxin, beautiful stone. 【Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography】Lin Yunkun. [Suoyin's Note] Kunxun is the second jade of stone. Hetuyun: Liuzhou has many accumulated stones, the name is Kunming stone. The chain is made into iron, so that it can be as bright as water.　Also the name of the mountain. [Former Han·Sima Xiangru's phonetic meaning] Kunxin, the name of the mountain. Good money out.　【Classes】This is a 㻍.
